A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA2Mjk0N2MtNGY0Mi00ZWFjLTkxODEtZDFjNDg4ZDliMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HaloFive00"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addictive show","reviewBody":"Grey's Anatomy is a surprisingly addictive show. The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! It's great for marathon viewings!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":282771,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kako sam upoznao vašu majku
programme.desc: Život družine dramatično će se promijeniti. Ted planira selidbu u Chicago, Marshall i Lily sele u Rim, a Robin i Barney planiraju vjenčanje. Serija je pripovijedana kroz sjećanja iz budućnosti. Polusatna komedija koja prati Teda koji traži pravu ljubav i njegove prijatelje. Ted je, upoznavši Robin, pomislio da je ona prava, ali je ubrzo shvatio da to nije tako. Serija je pripovijedana kroz sjećanja iz budućnosti.

A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA2Mjk0N2MtNGY0Mi00ZWFjLTkxODEtZDFjNDg4ZDliMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HaloFive00"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addictive show","reviewBody":"Grey's Anatomy is a surprisingly addictive show. The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! programme.title: The Flintstones
Obitelj Kremenko
programme.desc: The Flintstones: Directed by Brian Levant. With John Goodman, Elizabeth Perkins, Rick Moranis, Rosie O'Donnell. In a parallel modern-day Stone Age world, a working-class family, the Flintstones, are set up for an executive job. But they learn that money can't buy happiness." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0109813/","name":"The Flintstones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzY0ZTk4YzctNzYzNy00ZDQ0LTg2Y2ItZTQyYzQxMjQwMDc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a parallel modern-day Stone Age world, a working-class family, the Flintstones, are set up for an executive job. But they learn that money can't buy happiness.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0109813/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Peter Rasmussen Denmark"},"dateCreated":"2002-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great special effects","reviewBody":"This movie is a must for any fan of the great cartoon series from the 60's. The special effects and the sets are incredible, they have put a lot of work into making that. Every little detail, that can be seen in the cartoon, is also in this movie, for example a lizard like dinosaur running on a wheel to pull an elevator. However, less work has been done to write the plot, which is somewhat week and full of cliches. John Goodmann makes a great Fred, but Rick Moranis' Barney does not really resemble Mel Blanc's from the cartoon. I think his laugh is missing, also the general way Mel Blanc's Barney speaks is different. Rosie O'Donnel's Betty, on the other hand, is good. This movie is still a must for any Flinstones fan. The plot is not the most important part of this movie, the way Steven Spielberg made drawings come to live is."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":79441,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1994-05-27","keywords":"based on tv series,stone age,reboot of series,based on cartoon,dinosaur","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Flintstones (1994)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1458700569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ2YWIxZDktMjkxMC00YmFkLWFkYzQtNjZiMmI5ZTgwYzUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ2YWIxZDktMjkxMC00YmFkLWFkYzQtNjZiMmI5ZTgwYzUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Amblin"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000422/","name":"John Goodman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001548/","name":"Rick Moranis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005280/","name":"Rosie O'Donnell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0505152/","name":"Brian Levant"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024579/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0662678/","name":"Tom S. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA2Mjk0N2MtNGY0Mi00ZWFjLTkxODEtZDFjNDg4ZDliMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HaloFive00"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addictive show","reviewBody":"Grey's Anatomy is a surprisingly addictive show. The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! It's great for marathon viewings!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":282771,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tamo gde smo mi
To smo mi

A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA2Mjk0N2MtNGY0Mi00ZWFjLTkxODEtZDFjNDg4ZDliMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HaloFive00"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addictive show","reviewBody":"Grey's Anatomy is a surprisingly addictive show. The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! It's great for marathon viewings!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":282771,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA2Mjk0N2MtNGY0Mi00ZWFjLTkxODEtZDFjNDg4ZDliMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HaloFive00"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addictive show","reviewBody":"Grey's Anatomy is a surprisingly addictive show. The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! It's great for marathon viewings!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":282771,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
Kum 3
programme.desc: The Godfather: Part III: Directed by Francis Ford Coppola. With Al Pacino, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Andy Garcia. Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0099674/","name":"The Godfather: Part III","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWFlYWY2YjYtNjdhNi00MzVlLTg2MTMtMWExNzg4NmM5NmEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDk5Mzc5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0099674/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Duck II"},"dateCreated":"1999-10-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Terribly disappointed","reviewBody":"In some ways it was wonderful seeing some of the original cast members (Pacino, Keaton, Shire) reprising their memorable roles. But in a lot of ways this third installment was just not necessary. If it was all about revealing Michael's wounded mind, and ensuring that he was 'punished for his sins', that was done (quite well, and in a much less graphic way) in Part II: You could tell he was undone in the very last scene. Part III was just overkill.\n\nThere were a few casting problems, as well. Sofia Coppola was just terrible, absolutely painful to watch. George Hamilton made the film look like a made-for-TV movie every time he appeared: What was he doing there?? I sure did miss Robert Duvall! The saving graces were Talia Shire as Connie getting her chance to dominate. Andy Garcia, though he didn't have the opportunity to really take off, was a lot of fun to watch."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":379381,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1990-12-25","keywords":"opera,gangster,catholic church,violence,organized crime","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1237827865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYyZmQyMjMtMGQyMS00YjYwLWIxZWEtMzQ0ODNlYzFkM2YyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYyZmQyMjMtMGQyMS00YjYwLWIxZWEtMzQ0ODNlYzFkM2YyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"See the never-before-seen version of the final film, The #GodfatherCoda: The Death of Michael Corleone. Newly re-edited with restored picture and sound, experience the filmmaker’s true vision for the conclusion of the most celebrated saga in cinema history. In select theaters starting December 4."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000473/","name":"Diane Keaton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000412/","name":"Andy Garcia"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000338/","name":"Francis Ford Coppola"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035894/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701374/","name":"Mario Puzo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000338/","name":"Francis Ford Coppola"}],"duration":"PT2H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bad Santa 2
Zločesti Djed Mraz 2
programme.desc: Bad Santa 2: Directed by Mark Waters. With Billy Bob Thornton, Kathy Bates, Tony Cox, Christina Hendricks. Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1798603/","name":"Bad Santa 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM2MjE5Mzc4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjc3NjEyMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1798603/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Special-K88"},"dateCreated":"2016-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bad Decision","reviewBody":"Strained black comedy sequel reunites--for no reason that really makes any sense--Willie, the world's most vile Santa and his foulmouthed, feisty dwarf sidekick Marcus for yet another score, this time at a Chicago charity event on Christmas Eve. That darn kid returns, only this time he's a man (sort of), and as what's supposed to be an added bonus: Willie's equally crass mother (Bates, though even she is helpless against this flimsy material). Unnecessary, uninspired, and untimely follow-up doesn't have much of a plot to keep it afloat, playing mostly as an exercise in unfunny jokes, profane dialogue, and bodily fluids. Forced and forgettable, worth a few fleeting chuckles thanks to a well-chosen cast that elevates it as much as they possibly can. **"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24827,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-11-23","keywords":"santa claus character,ex convict,fired from the job,santas fighting,robbery","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4187403801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMzA5OTEyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI4MjIxMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMzA5OTEyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI4MjIxMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000671/","name":"Billy Bob Thornton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000870/","name":"Kathy Bates"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0185272/","name":"Tony Cox"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914132/","name":"Mark Waters"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0471578/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209925/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1752051/","name":"Johnny Rosenthal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189272/","name":"Shauna Cross"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275629/","name":"Glenn Ficarra"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1798603, Title: Bad Santa 2, --- Description: Bad Santa 2: Directed by Mark Waters. With Billy Bob Thornton, Kathy Bates, Tony Cox, Christina Hendricks. Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1798603/","name":"Bad Santa 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM2MjE5Mzc4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjc3NjEyMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1798603/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Special-K88","dateCreated":"2016-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bad Decision","reviewBody":"Strained black comedy sequel reunites--for no reason that really makes any sense--Willie, the world's most vile Santa and his foulmouthed, feisty dwarf sidekick Marcus for yet another score, this time at a Chicago charity event on Christmas Eve. That darn kid returns, only this time he's a man (sort of), and as what's supposed to be an added bonus: Willie's equally crass mother (Bates, though even she is helpless against this flimsy material). Unnecessary, uninspired, and untimely follow-up doesn't have much of a plot to keep it afloat, playing mostly as an exercise in unfunny jokes, profane dialogue, and bodily fluids. Forced and forgettable, worth a few fleeting chuckles thanks to a well-chosen cast that elevates it as much as they possibly can. **","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24827,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-11-23","keywords":"santa claus character,ex convict,fired from the job,santas fighting,robbery","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4187403801","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMzA5OTEyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI4MjIxMDI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMzA5OTEyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI4MjIxMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000671/","name":"Billy Bob Thornton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000870/","name":"Kathy Bates","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0185272/","name":"Tony Cox"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914132/","name":"Mark Waters"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0471578/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209925/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1752051/","name":"Johnny Rosenthal","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189272/","name":"Shauna Cross","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275629/","name":"Glenn Ficarra"],"duration":"PT1H32M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shrek 2
Shrek 2
programme.desc:
Shrek 2: Directed by Andrew Adamson, Kelly Asbury, Conrad Vernon. With Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Julie Andrews. Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0298148/","name":"Shrek 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDJhMGRjN2QtNDUxYy00NGM3LThjNGQtMmZiZTRhNjM4YzUxL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0298148/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dfranzen70"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"More Shrekervescence!","reviewBody":"I know what you're expecting me to say. "If you liked Shrek ..." And it's so true. Fans of the first will be ga-ga over the second. The gang at Dreamworks was smart enough not to monkey around with a winning formula, so you have all the wit and charm of Shrek (Mike Myers), Fiona (Cameron Diaz), Donkey (Eddie Murphy), and all the fantastic fairy-tale creatures.

At the beginning of 2, Shrek and Fiona have been invited by Fiona's parents (John Cleese and Julie Andrews) to the family castle. Imagine their surprise when the honeymooning ogres show up! Seems the king and queen haven't heard that a) Fiona's an ogre and b) that her husband is one, too. Naturally, this doesn't sit particularly well with the king, and soon he's hired a hit man - Puss in Boots, no less, voiced by Antonio Banderas - to bump off his new son in law. Meanwhile, a Fairy Godmother (Jennifer Saunders) offers help to Fiona. And quickly, the main question of the film - conveniently, it was the main question of the first film - is whether love conquers all. Oh, perhaps it's a bit more complex than that - perhaps it's whether Fiona would love Shrek, no matter what he looked like. Come to think of it, that was the theme of the first one as well. 

Shrek and Fiona journey to the land of Far, Far Away, where the stuffy king and the queen mum live. Far, Far Away is a clear knockoff of Hollywood itself (complete with the sign on the mountain), and the journey includes a pass through what looks like Beverly Hills. The attention to detail is marvelous, as always.

As with 1, 2 drops all sorts of Disney references, most resulting in full-out belly laughter. I was in stitches, although perhaps - just perhaps - some of the humor will zoom over your tiny tot's tiny head.

Shrek 2 is a beautifully done movie, perhaps even more entertaining than the original. Sure, at the end you know your emotions have been manipulated somewhat, but in the end you really don't care. Outstanding voice performances, flawless animation, and a crisp, moderately adult (but not mature, definitely not mature) script reign supreme.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":441517,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2004-08-04","keywords":"reference to spider man,ogre,cat,princess,puss in boots","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shrek 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1447231513","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGRhNGQwNjUtYmFlMS00ODdiLWI3YTUtNjViOWYzZmU2YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGRhNGQwNjUtYmFlMS00ODdiLWI3YTUtNjViOWYzZmU2YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Dreamworks"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000196/","name":"Mike Myers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000552/","name":"Eddie Murphy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0011470/","name":"Andrew Adamson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0038432/","name":"Kelly Asbury"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0970447/","name":"Conrad Vernon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069464/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0825308/","name":"William Steig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0011470/","name":"Andrew Adamson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0830294/","name":"Joe Stillman"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

The camera work is amazing.

I especially liked the on-locale settings of Russia and Germany.

Jason Bourne is a walking CIA specimen whom the agency deems to dangerous to live. Not all the facts are known about some mysterious murders in Berlin but Jason Bourne is suspected. You know his idyllic life on a remote island will be blown from the first.

How this all is resolved takes the viewer on a non-stop chase through various foreign countries.

When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0372183/","name":"The Bourne Supremacy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTIyMDFmMmItMWQzYy00MjBiLTg2M2UtM2JiNDRhOWE4NjBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0372183/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"pied","dateCreated":"2004-09-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Superior Action Film...","reviewBody":"This is a superior action film with the added bonus of good acting by Joan Allen, Matt Damon, and Karl Urban among others. The camera work is amazing.

I especially liked the on-locale settings of Russia and Germany.

Jason Bourne is a walking CIA specimen whom the agency deems to dangerous to live. Not all the facts are known about some mysterious murders in Berlin but Jason Bourne is suspected. You know his idyllic life on a remote island will be blown from the first.

How this all is resolved takes the viewer on a non-stop chase through various foreign countries. 

Good flick!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":450534,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2004-08-25","keywords":"hidden truth,suspense,secret past,dark past,amnesia","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004376/","name":"Franka Potente","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000260/","name":"Joan Allen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339030/","name":"Paul Greengrass"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0143778/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524924/","name":"Robert Ludlum","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"],"duration":"PT1H48M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
Ledeno doba: Zemlja se trese
programme.desc: Ice Age: Continental Drift: Directed by Steve Martino, Michael Thurmeier. With Aziz Ansari, Joy Behar, Christopher Campbell, Alain Chabat. Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1667889/","name":"Ice Age: Continental Drift","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NDM5MzY5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjExMDUwOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1667889/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Troy_Campbell"},"dateCreated":"2012-07-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fun for the whole family.","reviewBody":"Although not regarded in the same league as the Pixar and Disney output, the initial three Ice Age instalments collected over $2bn at the worldwide box office. (Rather surprisingly, that's $100m more than the Toy Story trilogy earned.) Posting figures as huge as that means we get treated to another adventure with mammoth Manny (Ray Romano), sabre-tooth tiger Diego (Denis Leary) and silly sloth Sid (John Leguizamo); this time with pirates. Like each episode before it, Ice Age 4 prides itself in offering up goofy laughs and goofier characters, with the ragtag bunch of pirates – led by Peter Dinklage's droll Captain Gutt and assisted by Nick Frost's uproarious elephant seal Flynn – the source of much joy. The old gang don't dissatisfy either: Sid is the standout as usual but Diego gets more laughs than normal and Scrat's little journey is ever-amusing. The serious Manny is still, well, the serious Manny, but you can't win them all. The bucket load of action remains too, however nothing here tops the dinosaur rumbling in part three. Continental Drift is gratifying escapism for the whole family that, despite being the fourth outing for these prehistoric creatures, shows few signs of letting up.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":201331,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2012-06-28","keywords":"pirate,iceberg,continental drift,pirate ship,ice age","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2524815897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3NjE4MzExNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk3MzgyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3NjE4MzExNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk3MzgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005380/","name":"Ray Romano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001459/","name":"Denis Leary"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000491/","name":"John Leguizamo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0553942/","name":"Steve Martino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0862211/","name":"Michael Thurmeier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047265/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0622634/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0179259/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0073850/","name":"Michael Berg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0297229/","name":"Jason Fuchs"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1000858/","name":"Lori Forte"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
Bourneovo naslijeđe
programme.desc: The Bourne Legacy: Directed by Tony Gilroy. With Jeremy Renner, Scott Glenn, Stacy Keach, Edward Norton. An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1194173/","name":"The Bourne Legacy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4Njk3MDM1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODgyOTMxOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1194173/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DUKEJBM"},"dateCreated":"2012-08-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Deeper Look At The Bourne Universe And That's A Good Thing!","reviewBody":"As a fan of the Bourne franchise, I enjoyed this deeper look in to that universe. The movie really does feel like one giant glorified DVD extra for that trilogy and I mean that in a good way. Deeper layers are revealed and the intrigue is as good as what we've seen before even though the character motivation isn't as strong across the board. Renner is fabulous as the second generation super spy. My only real complaint about this installment (because it does feel like they are blatantly building for three more films) is that the resolution has no real teeth. Still, it's a very good effort from a very good cast with hints and touches to the Bourne films of the past.\n\nOverall, a thumbs up and a very enjoyable time at the cinema."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":294970,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-09-05","keywords":"wolf,drone,pill,assassin,riding a motorcycle up stairs","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1065461017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk2MjY1NDIzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI4NjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk2MjY1NDIzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI4NjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719637/","name":"Jeremy Renner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001838/","name":"Rachel Weisz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001570/","name":"Edward Norton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0319659/","name":"Dan Gilroy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524924/","name":"Robert Ludlum"}],"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hardwired
Opasna meta
programme.desc: Hardwired: Directed by Ernie Barbarash. With Cuba Gooding Jr., Val Kilmer, Michael Ironside, Tatiana Maslany. After a tragic accident nearly claims Luke Gibson's life the Hexx Corporation hardwire an implant into his brain to save him, but Luke soon finds out that this new technology comes at price." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1405412/","name":"Hardwired","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUyYjMwMDAtMmExYS00NWU0LWE5OWEtMmZlZWM3ZmFkYmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a tragic accident nearly claims Luke Gibson's life the Hexx Corporation hardwire an implant into his brain to save him, but Luke soon finds out that this new technology comes at price.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1405412/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pistu34"},"dateCreated":"2009-10-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"ohhh pleeease..","reviewBody":"... this movie is soooo bad. I could tell you why, but it does not worth the words. Just spare your time and avoid it. It't lame and tells nothing new. :( Kilmer's character's hair is so funny that I was laughing for three minutes when he appeared in the movie... Actually all the characters are funny, as if they were a parody of themselves. I don't know if they were so bored to play such boring roles, or the script was too lame, or the director was sleeping in a corner during all the shooting, but this acting, and this entire movie is actually a shame for anyone who was involved in the making. Believe me, If you watch it, you will regret it in the end.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4270,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-11-03","keywords":"deception,memory chip,memory,false memory,repressed memory","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hardwired","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi364184857","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyMTEzNDg5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDY2NjM4MjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyMTEzNDg5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDY2NjM4MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a tragic accident claims the lives of Luke Gibson's (Gooding Jr.) wife and unborn child, he is left with critical injuries and complete amnesia. A new technological breakthrough from the Hexx Corporation - a Psi-Comp Implant that's hardwired into Luke's brain - saves his life, but Luke soon finds out that this new technology comes with a price and that the Hexx Corporation harbors sinister plans for the new device. With the help of new allies, Luke tries to recover the memories of his past while uncovering the Hexx Corporation's true motives."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000421/","name":"Cuba Gooding Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000174/","name":"Val Kilmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000461/","name":"Michael Ironside"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053228/","name":"Ernie Barbarash"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0222021/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086887/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071430/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0403629/","name":"Michael Hurst"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Astérix & Obélix: Mission Cléopâtre: Directed by Alain Chabat. With Gérard Depardieu, Christian Clavier, Jamel Debbouze, Monica Bellucci. Astérix and Obélix go to Egypt to help architect Numérobis who is building a palace for Cleopatra." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0250223/","name":"Astérix & Obélix: Mission Cléopâtre","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2Q3NmUzNjAtM2VjMS00MGU3LWE4YjEtZTM1NDM0YTdlOWRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astérix and Obélix go to Egypt to help architect Numérobis who is building a palace for Cleopatra.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0250223/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"soringax"},"dateCreated":"2002-02-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Exclusively French, but Monica is awesome","reviewBody":"You cannot be seeing the same movie if you didn't grow up in France (or spent at least 10 years there, like me). I don't know if it will ever make it outside French cultural borders (I include Belgium and Luxembourg here). You cannot translate its kind of fun - every name is joke (how many people outside Paris would understand the pun in "Couloirdebus", the name of one of the Roman legionnaires ?). However Monica Bel(l?)ucci is so beautiful, I almost forgot to breathe when I saw her.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51429,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2002-01-30","keywords":"architect,based on comic book,egypt,druid,cleopatra","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1979890201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YyNTIxYzAtYzg2Yi00YzAyLThmYWEtOGQwYWJmZWU4MjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YyNTIxYzAtYzg2Yi00YzAyLThmYWEtOGQwYWJmZWU4MjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000367/","name":"Gérard Depardieu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002010/","name":"Christian Clavier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213354/","name":"Jamel Debbouze"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149260/","name":"Alain Chabat"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090290/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049807/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0331453/","name":"René Goscinny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0879853/","name":"Albert Uderzo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149260/","name":"Alain Chabat"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shrek the Third
Shrek Treći
programme.desc: Shrek the Third: Directed by Chris Miller, Raman Hui. With Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Antonio Banderas. Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0413267/","name":"Shrek the Third","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyMjc3ODk2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjY0MjEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413267/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lejink"},"dateCreated":"2008-08-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ogre and out...?","reviewBody":"It took me a while to catch up with the third edition of the money-spinning "Shrek" franchise and I was vaguely aware of a less than positive critical, if not popular response, to it but was pleasantly surprised with the product on show. Okay, it's pick-your-cliché from "the law of diminishing returns", "familiarity breeding contempt" and "too much of a good thing", but hey, I still like these characters and whilst I now would doubt whether the characters and situations can be developed any further at least on the big-screen, it's certainly been one of the better trilogies of recent years. The graphics and animations are as before so good as to make you think you're wearing 3D spex and the story, while contrived (I'm not quite sure how Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table actually qualify as classic children's fairy-tale or cartoon favourites) shares the laughs around before winding up at the by now familiar happy-ending finish with a romp-out to a classic track from yesteryear, this time Sly Stone's funk-tastic "Thank you...". Best moments are the Gingerbread Man's life flashing before him in a (threatened) pre-death moment and the four Disney princesses (plus one ugly step-sister!) giving it some attitude as they find liberation (even burning a bra symbolically, in the process). Best line, as usual, goes to Eddie Murphy's Donkey "I'm being attacked by an ogre - with issues!". There aren't as many outright belly-laughs as in the peerless first "Shrek", you feel that Shrek and Fiona are more bit-players in their own movie (I can't believe I'm humanising animated characters!) and occasionally you're made to wait for the next really good joke (Eric Idle's Merlin and Justin Timberlake's Arthur don't exactly leap off the page/screen either), so yes, this outing of the not-so-jolly green giant, may not be as good as its predecessors but that's down to the lack of surprise at revisiting these stock characters and, heck, they were mighty good predecessors!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":294534,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-06-06","keywords":"shrek,king,puss in boots,donkey,kingdom","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shrek the Okay, it's pick-your-cliché from "the law of diminishing returns", "familiarity breeding contempt" and "too much of a good thing", but hey, I still like these characters and whilst I now would doubt whether the characters and situations can be developed any further at least on the big-screen, it's certainly been one of the better trilogies of recent years. The graphics and animations are as before so good as to make you think you're wearing 3D spex and the story, while contrived (I'm not quite sure how Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table actually qualify as classic children's fairy-tale or cartoon favourites) shares the laughs around before winding up at the by now familiar happy-ending finish with a romp-out to a classic track from yesteryear, this time Sly Stone's funk-tastic "Thank you...". Best moments are the Gingerbread Man's life flashing before him in a (threatened) pre-death moment and the four Disney princesses (plus one ugly step-sister!) giving it some attitude as they find liberation (even burning a bra symbolically, in the process). Best line, as usual, goes to Eddie Murphy's Donkey "I'm being attacked by an ogre - with issues!". There aren't as many outright belly-laughs as in the peerless first "Shrek", you feel that Shrek and Fiona are more bit-players in their own movie (I can't believe I'm humanising animated characters!) and occasionally you're made to wait for the next really good joke (Eric Idle's Merlin and Justin Timberlake's Arthur don't exactly leap off the page/screen either), so yes, this outing of the not-so-jolly green giant, may not be as good as its predecessors but that's down to the lack of surprise at revisiting these stock characters and, heck, they were mighty good predecessors!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":294534,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-06-06","keywords":"shrek,king,puss programme.title: Cars
Auti
programme.desc: Cars: Directed by John Lasseter, Joe Ranft. With Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt, Larry the Cable Guy. A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ahuffman_2000"},"dateCreated":"2006-05-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar and Disney did it again!","reviewBody":"Without giving away any of the story, here's my take. I attended the premiere of CARS at LMS on Friday, May 26. True to Disney form, the premiere itself was spectacular. Four giant screens, live entertainment,lots of fireworks, great inclusion of military personnel, and as good of a red carpet as you can do with chain link fenced areas... This movie rates right in the middle of Pixar releases for me. I place it above Monsters Inc, A Bug's Life and Toy Story 2, but not as good as the "original", the best ever, Toy Story, and The Incredibles. Everything just looks so real in this movie. The dust stirred up when Lightning drives off, the scenery around Route 66 (well, maybe not those mountains that look like the fins of old cars). Even the shine on the clean cars looks so real. As an adult, I enjoyed the story line. I can't tell you how the kids would like it, as by the time the movie finally started, my kids were asleep. As always, don't leave your seat until all of the credits roll. Sometimes they are some of the funniest clips in the movie! You'll love them this time, as they tie back to prior Pixar movies, in a car sort of way. This is definitely a movie we'll add to the DVD collection. I really hope this movie does well since it's the first release since Disney bought Pixar. Don't go in looking for the action or adult humor of The Incredibles. If you do you'll be disappointed. Just go in looking for the "Disney always has a good moral behind its animated movies" type of movie and you will really enjoy it. Paul Newman and Larry the Cable Guy really have the best characters in the movie. And while John Ratzenberger's character doesn't have a lot of screen time, I really enjoyed him! I'll be going back to see it when it releases in theaters so I can get a better feel for the sound, as it wasn't the best in an outdoor setting. In my opinion, it easily beats the other animated movies released over the past year or so.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":393517,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
Bornov ultimatum
programme.desc:
The Bourne Ultimatum: Directed by Paul Greengrass. With Matt Damon, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Scott Glenn. Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0440963/","name":"The Bourne Ultimatum","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGNiNmU2YTMtZmU4OS00MjM0LTlmYWUtMjVlYjAzYjE2N2RjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0440963/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Listen_to_the_Law"},"dateCreated":"2007-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Smart and Gripping","reviewBody":"The Bourne Ultimatum is the third and final outing for super-spy Jason Bourne, a man who is out to kill the people who made him into a killer. The Bourne series is one of the highest regarded trilogies by critics (Ultimatum has an 85/100 on metacritic.com, meaning it's status is "universal acclaim) and for good reason- the fighting is choreographed very well and the deep story can be very engrossing.

First, I highly advise you watch The Bourne Identity and The Bourne Supremacy, the two fancy-titled prequels to Ultimatum. There may be three different movies, but in reality they are all a continuance of one another: missing one leaves you stranded and confused, just like I was. You will still be about to enjoy the action and fight scenes of Ultimatum if you missed the first two, but then the story will definitely lead to some confusion.

If you were lucky enough to view the prequels to this movie, you probably had a treat watching Bourne take down his enemies and track down the man who screwed him from Supremacy. Jason Bourne is played very well by Matt Damon. Damon does nothing to deserve an Oscar nod, but his work here is good enough to hold it's own. Bourne's adventures take place in many different cities; the cities are all varied enough to keep the movie from becoming bland at times. The agency tracking Bourne takes advantage of every technological tool known to mankind to track him down.

I won't go into detail on the characters because they are continuations off of the first two movies. However, it wouldn't hurt the movie to spell a few things out for the audience- not every viewer is a die-hard movie watcher who can pick up on every little hint about story development. Ultimatum wouldn't have been harmed at all if the story was a little more up front.

It seems most people agree that Ultimatum was a success of a film: the movie opened to $69 million, and -box office total now is up to $216 mil- is currently still going very strongly for a movie that has been in theatres since August 3. It's the best action movie I've seen since Live Free or Die Hard.

Good) Damon is solid but not spectacular, very smart movie Bad) Story is like many others","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":620424,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2007-08-08","keywords":"memory,dark past,flashback,blockbuster,surprise ending","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183149/","name":"Edgar Ramírez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000260/","name":"Joan Allen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339030/","name":"Paul Greengrass"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0221156/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1994243/","name":"Scott Z. IMDb data; ttnr: 0440963, Title: The Bourne Ultimatum, --- Description: The Bourne Ultimatum: Directed by Paul Greengrass. With Matt Damon, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Scott Glenn. Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0440963/","name":"The Bourne Ultimatum","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGNiNmU2YTMtZmU4OS00MjM0LTlmYWUtMjVlYjAzYjE2N2RjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0440963/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Listen_to_the_Law","dateCreated":"2007-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Smart and Gripping","reviewBody":"The Bourne Ultimatum is the third and final outing for super-spy Jason Bourne, a man who is out to kill the people who made him into a killer. The Bourne series is one of the highest regarded trilogies by critics (Ultimatum has an 85/100 on metacritic.com, meaning it's status is "universal acclaim) and for good reason- the fighting is choreographed very well and the deep story can be very engrossing.

First, I highly advise you watch The Bourne Identity and The Bourne Supremacy, the two fancy-titled prequels to Ultimatum. There may be three different movies, but in reality they are all a continuance of one another: missing one leaves you stranded and confused, just like I was. You will still be about to enjoy the action and fight scenes of Ultimatum if you missed the first two, but then the story will definitely lead to some confusion.

If you were lucky enough to view the prequels to this movie, you probably had a treat watching Bourne take down his enemies and track down the man who screwed him from Supremacy. Jason Bourne is played very well by Matt Damon. Damon does nothing to deserve an Oscar nod, but his work here is good enough to hold it's own. Bourne's adventures take place in many different cities; the cities are all varied enough to keep the movie from becoming bland at times. The agency tracking Bourne takes advantage of every technological tool known to mankind to track him down.

I won't go into detail on the characters because they are continuations off of the first two movies. However, it wouldn't hurt the movie to spell a few things out for the audience- not every viewer is a die-hard movie watcher who can pick up on every little hint about story development. Ultimatum wouldn't have been harmed at all if the story was a little more up front.

It seems most people agree that Ultimatum was a success of a film: the movie opened to $69 million, and -box office total now is up to $216 mil- is currently still going very strongly for a movie that has been in theatres since August 3. It's the best action movie I've seen since Live Free or Die Hard.

Good) Damon is solid but not spectacular, very smart movie Bad) Story is like many others","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":620424,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2007-08-08","keywords":"memory,dark past,flashback,blockbuster,surprise ending","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183149/","name":"Edgar Ramírez","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000260/","name":"Joan Allen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339030/","name":"Paul Greengrass"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0221156/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1994243/","name":"Scott Z. programme.title: Glitter
Glitter
programme.desc: Glitter: Directed by Vondie Curtis-Hall. With Mariah Carey, Max Beesley, Da Brat, Tia Texada. A young singer dates a disc jockey who helps her get into the music business, but their relationship become complicated as she ascends to super stardom." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0118589/","name":"Glitter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGJkN2IxNTYtZDE1OS00MWJhLWFhNzItNTZkMjM4OGUzMTE2L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTg3MTc4ODY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young singer dates a disc jockey who helps her get into the music business, but their relationship become complicated as she ascends to super stardom.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118589/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TYANDSAHONA"},"dateCreated":"2004-10-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Was it that bad? Really?","reviewBody":"Okay, for the record, this was a lousy film. But did it deserve the sort of bombastic universal panning it received? It was not nearly in the league of such absolute bombs as Gigli, Black Dog or anything with Rutger Hauer. It was a formulaic, wish-fulfillment movie worthy of being a Lifetime Special or an ABC Movie of the Week. It sucked, but it wasn't the sort of movie that scars one for life. After all the jokes and hype I was disappointed when I saw this movie on cable this weekend. I was expecting Ishtar. To me, this points up a problem with how our culture reviews movies. Every so often critics, (who are cynical bastards anyway) seem to pick out a movie to practice witty cruelty upon as a sort of mental exercise. Poor Glitter, and poor Mariah, who had a nervous breakdown over how this movie was received by the critical establishment!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23340,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":2.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-09-21","keywords":"movie flop,bad movie,trash movie,z movie,b movie","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Glitter","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1940521241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWI5ODUyNTAtOTdmMS00NjViLWIyNDUtYWJkMGUxZjcyNjRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWI5ODUyNTAtOTdmMS00NjViLWIyNDUtYWJkMGUxZjcyNjRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001014/","name":"Mariah Carey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0073160/","name":"Eric Benét"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0066586/","name":"Max Beesley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193554/","name":"Vondie Curtis-Hall"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041390/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0921985/","name":"Cheryl L. programme.title: Step Up
Step Up
programme.desc: Step Up: Directed by Anne Fletcher. With Channing Tatum, Jenna Dewan, Damaine Radcliff, De'Shawn Washington. Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0462590/","name":"Step Up","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODEzMzVhODgtOTc1NS00MmY3LWI3OGUtN2ZjNDEwM2ExZjJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0462590/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"avoisawesome"},"dateCreated":"2006-08-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"step up was GOOD.","reviewBody":"people keep talking about how awful "step up" was, or how it was such a waste of money. but now here are my two cents. it was, in fact, a good movie. the dancing was FABULOUS, and even though the acting could have improved, this movie was nothing short of amazing. the music was catchy and hot, and there was just enough romance in it to make it cute but not gross or sleazy. it had literally EVERYTHING you could ask for in a movie: romance, drama, comedy, and it was even slightly scary at some parts, too. Channing Tatum and Jenna Dewan did a great job. their dancing, along with everyone else's, was phenomenal. when i left the movie, i was actually inspired to be a dancer (even though i never will be.) the main reason people are turning down this movie is because of the acting. sure, the acting could have been better, but this movie was focusing on the DANCING. obviously you have to be a good actor to be in a movie, but the dancing was the main focus of this film. and i personally think the dancing was great. i couldn't ask for it to be better. this movie is definitely worth seeing, whether you're into hip-hop or programme.title: Bijes pod kontrolom
programme.desc: Kako Charlie može pomoći svojim pacijentima da se izbore s bijesom kad se i sam mora nositi s različitim ispadima bijesa njegove kćeri tinejdžerice, sarkazmom bivše supruge i drugima? "Bijes pod kontrolom" je hit-komedija s Charliejem Sheenom u ulozi Charlieja, nekonvencionalnog psihijatra čija je specijalnost kontrola bijesa. Nekoć je bio sportaš, no problemi s bijesom prekinuli su mu karijeru.

programme.title: Vrasësi: Agjenti Jun
programme.desc: 2020. Pasioni i një ish-agjenti legjendar për të vizatuar novela grafike, bëhet më i rrezikshëm se profesioni i tij i vjetër, kur vizatimet e frymëzuara nga jeta e tij e mëparshme, publikohen padashje në internet...
programme.category: Kinemaja aziatike

programme.title: Mbreti Akrep: Libri i shpirtrave
programme.desc: 2018. Mbreti Akrep bashkon forcat me nje luftëtare të quajtur Tala. Sëbashku ata do të kërkojnë një relike legjendare të njohur si 'Libri i shpirtrave', i cili u nevojtitet për te mposhtur një kryekomandant të lig.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Mashtrimi
programme.desc: B.Affleck, G.Sinise, C.Theron. Gjithçka nis dhe mbaron me një mashtrim. Rudy i ka vene syrin Ashley-t, por ajo del edhe me Nikun! Por s'mbaron këtu! Ashley ka edhe një vella, i cili mban fort ne duar fatin e motres se tij te dashur!
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: MI 5 Identitet i dyfishtë
programme.desc: Kit Harington, Peter Firth. Kur një terrorist i rrezikshëm arrin të arratiset, një ish agjent bashkon forcat me shefin e çnderuar të shërbimit sekret MI-5, për të ndalur një sulm vdekjeprurës në Londër.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Të humbur në Paqësor
programme.desc: Një avion luksoz bën ulje të detyruar në një ishull misterioz pasi ndesh një stuhi të fuqishme mbi Oqeanin Paqësor. Teksa presin ekipin e shpëtimit, pasagjerët kuptojnë se ishulli fsheh një sekret që mund të jetë më i rrezikshëm se stuhia.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: 12 Raunde III
programme.desc: Dean Ambrose. I futur në kurth nga kolegë të tij për një vrasje që nuk e ka kryer, nje polic bën të pamundurën për të pastruar emrin e tij...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Besnikja
programme.desc: Shailene Woodley, Theo James. Pas zbulimeve tronditëse të 'Kryengritësja', Trisi dhe Katra duhet të arratisen përtej murit qe rrethon Çikagon, për të kuptuar më në fund të vërtetën për botën që e tyre...
programme.category: Fantashkencë
aventurë

programme.title: Natë mbijetese
programme.desc: 2019.Dolph Lundgren. Pasi një darkë e gëzueshme familjare ndërpritet brutalisht nga mercenarë në kërkim të një thesari të fshehur, një agjent super i trajnuar i interpolit lufton kundër çdo shansi për të shpëtuar familjarët e tij.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Grusht global
programme.desc: C.Owen, N.Watts. Një agjent i Interpolit dhe një Zv. Prokurore janë te vendosur të vënë përpara drejtësisë një nga bankat më të fuqishme të botës, e përfshirë në trafikun e armëve drejtuar nga një nga organizatat më të mëdha kriminale në botë.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Atentat në stadium
programme.desc: Dave Bautista, Pierce Brosnan. Pasi një grup terroristësh marrin peng mbesën e tij gjatë një ndeshje futbolli, një ish-ushtar me aftësi vdekjeprurëse dyluftimi, nis një luftë për ta shpëtuar atë dhe për të shmangur një shkatërrim në masë.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Trashëgimia e gënjeshtrave
programme.desc: Scott Adkins. Një ish agjent i shërbimeve sekrete britanike detyrohet t'i rikthehet botës së spiunazhit. Me ndihmën e një gazetareje ukrainase, ai zbulon të vërteta tronditëse rreth operacioneve sekrete të kryera nga shërbime të panjohura.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Sulm në rajonin 33
programme.desc: Sean Patrick Flanery. Një veteran i dekoruar që vuan nga stresi post traumatik bëhet dëshmitar i pengmarrjes së një spitali lokal nga terroristë të mirëorganizuar. Vajza, bashkëshortja e tij dhe një gjeneral janë brenda në godinë dhe ai është shpresa e ty.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Titanët e Paqësorit 2:Rebelimi
programme.desc: 2018. Me John Boyega. Piloti rebel Xheik Pentekost do të bashkojë forcat me hakeren 15-vjeçare dhe me ish-kolegun e tij, kundër një kërcënimi të ri alien. Ata do ta çojnë në një shkallë tjetër këte aventurë spektakolare.

programme.title: Etje për hakmarrje
programme.desc: 2019. Frank Grillo. Me shumë mundim, Nik ndërtoi një jetë të re dhe besonte se kishte shpëtuar nga e kaluara e tij kriminale. Por kur shoku i vjetër i vret gruan, ai detyrohet t'i kthehet jetës së dëshpëruar dhe të dhunshme që ai mendoi se e la pas.

programme.title: Vrasje me Pagesë
programme.desc: J.Piven, B.Affleck, A.Garcia, R.Liotta. Kur Buddy 'Aces' Israel, keqbërësi i vogël, i lidhur me gangsterin Primo Sparazza, vendos të bashkëpunojë me drejtësinë, ky i fundit vë nje shpërblim prej 1 milion dollarësh për kokën e tij.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.category: Aksion
krim
